summary:
People will now comment about you wearing mage robes with all types of college robes.
This includes both variants of the Archmage robes and all Master/Expert/Adept/Apprentice/Novice robes.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]This mod is now unnecessary as it is included in [url=/skyrim/mods/19]Unoffical Skyrim Patch[/url][/size]

People would previously only comment about you wearing mage robes if you had Novice or unhooded Archmage robes.
This fix makes them speak about all types of college robes including both variants of the Archmage robes and all Master/Expert/Adept/Apprentice/Novice robes.

Without this fix, they would only comment if were wearing novice or unhooded Archmage robes.

Now includes the School specific enchanted robes - thanks to aramil316 for spotting the omission!
author: ScarabMonkey
